data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the county of West Garo Hills.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of West Garo Hills, Meghalaya, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 7,076 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the county of West Garo Hills.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the county of West Garo Hills prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Koch (Muslim traditions) people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Over 97.69 percent of the people of West Garo Hills are far from Jesus.
Lord, teach the young people in the county of West Garo Hills to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.section_summary:
the county of West Garo Hills, Meghalaya, India has a population of 643,300.

We estimate West Garo Hills has 7,076 people who might know Jesus, 7,805 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 628,418 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the county of West Garo Hills prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
